description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省下辖的地级市，位于广东省南部，是粤港澳大湾区和珠江—西江经济带的重要节点城市。佛山是国家历史文化名城，历史上是中国的四大名镇之一，现为全国重要的制造业基地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in the south of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is an important hub in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and the Pearl River-Xijiang Economic Belt. Foshan is a National Famous Historical and Cultural City, historically one of the four famous towns in China, and is now a major manufacturing base in the country.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任佛山市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Foshan Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国蒙古族政治人物，现任佛山市人民政府市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Mongol ethnicity, currently serving as the Mayor of the Foshan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Chairman of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记、佛山市市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, formerly served as the Party Secretary and Mayor of Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 东晋时期来自罽宾（今克什米尔）的三藏法师，他将佛教传入佛山地区。
description.en: A Tripiṭaka master from Jibin (modern Kashmir) during the Eastern Jin dynasty, who introduced Buddhism to the Foshan area.

description.zh-cn: 明朝佛山乡绅，曾组织“忠义营”镇压黄萧养起义。
description.en: A local gentry of Foshan during the Ming dynasty, who organized the 'Zhongyi Camp' to suppress the Huang Xiaoyang uprising.

description.zh-cn: 明朝中期广东农民起义的领袖。
description.en: Leader of a peasant uprising in Guangdong during the mid-Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝咸丰年间太平天国将领，曾以佛山为基地围攻广州。
description.en: A Taiping Rebellion general during the Xianfeng era of the Qing dynasty, who used Foshan as a base to besiege Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年官员，其部下曾击败李文茂领导的太平军。
description.en: An official in the late Qing dynasty, whose subordinates defeated the Taiping army led by Li Wenmao.

nodes.id: 中国共产党佛山市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党佛山市委员会
en: Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在佛山市的地方组织，是佛山市的领导核心。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Foshan, serving as the city's leadership core.

description.zh-cn: 佛山市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Foshan City.

nodes.id: 佛山市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 佛山市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Foshan Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 佛山市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Foshan Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会
en: Foshan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在佛山市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Foshan City.

description.zh-cn: 明朝正统年间，由佛山乡绅梁广等人组织的地方武装，用于镇压黄萧养起义。
description.en: A local armed force organized by Foshan gentry such as Liang Guang during the Zhengtong era of the Ming Dynasty to suppress the Huang Xiaoyang uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由明太祖朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, established by Emperor Hongwu (Zhu Yuanzhang).

description.zh-cn: 太平天国运动中的军队，清末由洪秀全组织的农民起义军。
description.en: The army of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, a peasant rebel army organized by Hong Xiuquan in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 佛山的古称。
description.en: The ancient name for Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 佛山在明清时期的称谓，当时是中国四大名镇之一。
description.en: The name of Foshan during the Ming and Qing dynasties, when it was one of the four famous towns of China.

description.zh-cn: 明朝中期在广东爆发的一场大规模农民起义。
description.en: A large-scale peasant uprising that broke out in Guangdong during the mid-Ming dynasty.

relationships.target: 中国共产党佛山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 唐屹峰自2024年10月起担任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记。
description.en: Tang Yifeng has been serving as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China since October 2024.

relationships.target: 佛山市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 胡钛自2021年11月起担任佛山市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Hu Ti has been serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Foshan Municipal People's Congress since November 2021.

description.zh-cn: 白涛自2021年10月起担任佛山市人民政府市长。
description.en: Bai Tao has been serving as the Mayor of the Foshan Municipal People's Government since October 2021.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 李政华自2022年1月起担任中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会主席。
description.en: Li Zhenghua has been serving as the Chairman of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference since January 2022.

relationships.target: 中国共产党佛山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑轲于2021年6月至2024年10月期间担任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记。
description.en: Zheng Ke served as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China from June 2021 to October 2024.

relationships.target: 中国共产党佛山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 鲁毅于2016年3月至2021年5月期间担任中国共产党佛山市委员会书记。
description.en: Lu Yi served as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China from March 2016 to May 2021.

description.zh-cn: 鲁毅于2014年5月至2016年3月期间担任佛山市人民政府市长。
description.en: Lu Yi served as the Mayor of the Foshan Municipal People's Government from May 2014 to March 2016.

description.zh-cn: 东晋隆安二年（398年），达毗耶舍来到季华乡塔坡岗修建佛寺，传播佛教，为该地后来被命名为“佛山”埋下伏笔。
description.en: In 398 AD (the second year of the Long'an era of the Eastern Jin dynasty), Dabhiyesa came to Tapo Hill in Jihua Township to build a Buddhist temple and spread Buddhism, which paved the way for the place to be later named 'Foshan'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝正统十四年（1449年），梁广等乡绅组织地方武装“忠义营”以镇压黄萧养农民起义。
description.en: In 1449 (the 14th year of the Zhengtong era of the Ming dynasty), local gentry led by Liang Guang organized the 'Zhongyi Camp' to suppress the Huang Xiaoyang peasant uprising.

description.zh-cn: 黄萧养是明朝中期广东农民起义的领导者。
description.en: Huang Xiaoyang was the leader of the peasant uprising in Guangdong during the mid-Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: “忠义营”参与镇压了黄萧养农民起义。
description.en: The 'Zhongyi Camp' participated in suppressing the Huang Xiaoyang peasant uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在镇压黄萧养起义后，明朝朝廷封梁广等人为“忠义官”。
description.en: After suppressing the Huang Xiaoyang uprising, the Ming court ennobled Liang Guang and others as 'Zhongyi Guan' (Loyal and Righteous Officials).

description.zh-cn: 为表彰本地乡绅的贡献，明朝朝廷封佛山为“忠义乡”。
description.en: To commend the contributions of local gentry, the Ming court granted Foshan the title of 'Zhongyi Xiang' (Loyal and Righteous Township).

description.zh-cn: 李文茂是太平天国在广东地区的将领，以佛山为基地进行活动。
description.en: Li Wenmao was a general of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom in the Guangdong region, operating from a base in Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝咸丰年间，叶名琛的部下击败了李文茂领导的围攻广州的太平军。
description.en: During the Xianfeng era of the Qing Dynasty, Ye Mingchen's subordinates defeated the Taiping army led by Li Wenmao that was besieging Guangzhou.
